column31: If Dylan Sampson starts for JP in 2025-2028 championship game & Piper beats JP in 2027 standings = 2028 1st from JP
If Dylan Sampson starts for JP in 2025-2028 championship game & JP beats Piper in 2027 standings = 2029 1st from JP
If Dylan Sampson does not start for JP in 2025-2028 championship game = 2028 2nd from JP
If Dylan Sampson starts for JP in 1 or more 2025-2028 games = $1 in 2029 from JP
